title: Signpainters in Seattle?
content: Hey guys and girls... a client of ours is looking for a signpainter in Seattle to do a few signs for a party they're throwing. Does anyone have any referrals? Thanks in advance!
author: antiuser

comments.content:
[info@borgeslettering.com](mailto:info@borgeslettering.com)

Sorry I did not include that in the first post.

Michael
Thanks for the info, we'll get in touch with him.

If you want someone old school, look up Bruce Hale. As top of the line as you can get.

For another option, the Collier Sign company does fine work as well.
